tns:patch.author: Dan
tns:patch.description: Modify Sub Sub Sector- Add parent sector for mondrian

script.lang: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_sub_sub_sectors AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, s.name, s.amp_sector_id, a.sector_percentage,parent_sector_id FROM amp_activity_sector a, amp_sector s WHERE a.amp_sector_id = s.amp_sector_id AND getsectordepth(s.amp_sector_id) = 2 AND (s.amp_sec_scheme_id IN ( SELECT c.classification_id FROM amp_classification_config c WHERE c.name::text = 'Primary'::text)) ORDER BY a.amp_activity_id, s.name;
